item.title: Lila add a quote by Isaac Kramnick
item.description: "If you want to go public with your opinions, then someone is going to judge you a moron. And there is always a risk that you may be." -- Isaac Kramnick

item.title: Lila add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "The Lord prefers common-looking people. That is why he made so many of them." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Lila add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "All I have learned, I learned from books." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Lila add a quote by Warren G. Bennis
item.description: "Managers do things right. Leaders do the right thing." -- Warren G. Bennis

item.title: Lila add a quote by Peter Drucker Warren Bennis
item.description: "Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things." -- Peter Drucker Warren Bennis

item.title: Lila add a quote by Warren Bennis
item.description: "Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality." -- Warren Bennis

item.title: Lila add a quote by Peter F. Drucker
item.description: "The most important thing in communication is to hear what isn't being said." -- Peter F. Drucker

item.title: Lila add a quote by Peter Drucker
item.description: "The best way to predict your future is to create it" -- Peter Drucker

item.title: Lila add a quote by Peter Drucker
item.description: "The purpose of business is to create and keep a customer." -- Peter Drucker

item.title: Lila add a quote by Peter Drucker
item.description: "Business has only two functions â€” marketing and innovation." -- Peter Drucker

item.title: Lila add a quote by Peter Drucker
item.description: "The leaders who work most effectively, it seems to me, never say "I." And that's not because they have trained themselves not to say "I." They don't think "I." They think "we"; they think "team." They understand their job to be to make the team function. They accept responsibility and don't sidestep it, but "we" gets the credit. This is what creates trust, what enables you to get the task done." -- Peter Drucker

item.title: Lila add a quote by Peter F. Drucker
item.description: "People who don't take risks generally make about two big mistakes a year. People who do take risks generally make about two big mistakes a year." -- Peter F. Drucker

item.title: Lila add a quote by Carly Fiorina, Former CEO, , president and chairman of Hewlett Packard
item.description: "Engage your heart, your gut, and your mind in every decision you make." -- Carly Fiorina, Former CEO, , president and chairman of Hewlett Packard
